meanings.definition: The process of converting a substance into an aromatic compound.
meanings.sent1: During the aromatization of the ingredients, a delightful smell filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The aromatization of the flowers created a lovely scent in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The aromatization of the room was so strong that it made everyone sneeze!
meanings.sent4: Her cooking had the magical aromatization of turning ordinary ingredients into a flavorful dish.
meanings.sent5: The aromatization of the perfume was so intense that it lingered in the air for hours.

meanings.definition: The act of imparting a pleasant fragrance or odor to something.
meanings.sent1: The aromatization of the room with fresh flowers made it feel welcoming.
meanings.sent2: The aromatization of the bakery with cinnamon made customers crave pastries.
meanings.sent3: The aromatization of the car with a pine-scented air freshener made it smell like a forest!
meanings.sent4: Her baking had the aromatization of filling the house with the scent of warm cookies.
meanings.sent5: The aromatization of the laundry detergent made clothes smell fresh and clean.
